name: Sample
description: 1. Intstall [nodejs](http://nodejs.org/) make sure to check the npm option and allow node installation to add it to path. 2. Install [bower](http://bower.io/) a package manager for the web,  open cmd and type 'npm install -g bower' 3. Install [grunt](http://gruntjs.com/) the JavaScript Task Runner, type 'npm install -g grunt-cli' 4. Install karma (jasmin tests runner) 'npm install -g karma'
